rows.label: qev060101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Well, OBVIOUSLY if you devoltanize something like that
you're going to hurt yourself. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0002
rows.name:
Ugh, and we still have a ton of collection work left.
*fsssh* What am I going to do about this mess?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_JNK0010
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev060101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask if the xenoform needs any help.

rows.label: qev060101_JNK0020
rows.name: Interrogate

rows.label: qev060101_SEL0021
rows.name:
Demand to know what the suspicious
xenoform is doing here.

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0003
rows.name:
I am flattered you would ask. *fsssh*
So many of you humans really are kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0004
rows.name:
*fsssh* I see you humans trust us as little as the
others do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0005
rows.name:
The job I am doing now is important, not least for its
role in helping break down those prejudices. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0006
rows.name:
*fsssh* We Zaruboggan are beginning a new initiative
concerning this city's voltant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0007
rows.name:
Your kind discards it as unnecessary, but it is the
source of life for us. *fsssh* This is why we have
begun a collection service.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0008
rows.name:
All was going well until my friend decided to
devoltanize something called a "hamburger"
from that restaurant. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0009
rows.name:
I'm afraid he's out cold. *fsssh* His own fault, really.
Even an idiot knows that everything but voltant is
swimming with impurities.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0010
rows.name:
Now I'm responsible for collecting more voltant from
the people here than I possibly can by myself.
Such a bother! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0011
rows.name:
I was just trying to figure out a plan when you
arrived.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0012
rows.name: *fsssssssssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0013
rows.name: I don't suppose you would be willing to help me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0014
rows.name:
As a resident, you know the city well. *fsssh*
With your help, I could be done in no time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0015
rows.name:
I would really like to make this new initiative succeed,
and working together with you would make it even
better. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0017
rows.name:
*fsssh* So then, you must speak with a doctor named
Jeffrey, a recycling operator named Graham, and a
Ma-non named Pfeffen. [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0018
rows.name: Please gather voltant from all three of them. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0019
rows.name: Oh, and be careful when handling it. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0020
rows.name:
*fsssh* Voltant is to you what that hamburger was to
my dumb, unconscious friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_JNK0030
rows.name: Thank

rows.label: qev060101_SEL0031
rows.name:
Express gratitude for Shiraton's disposing
of this dangerous substance.

rows.label: qev060101_JNK0040
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev060101_SEL0041
rows.name:
Ask Shiraton if it's safe for you
to be lugging voltant around.

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0021
rows.name:
Not at all. *fsssh*
It is we who must thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0022
rows.name:
*fsssh* If you did not share your supply of voltant with
us, we would not be able to go on living.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0023
rows.name:
Once you have all three loads, please hurry back here
with them. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0024
rows.name:
No cause for worry. *fsssh* I'll be happy to fix any
minor voltant contamination you suffer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0025
rows.name:
Once you have all three loads, please hurry back here
with them. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0026
rows.name:
Apparently you all have quite a bit of voltant here in
your city. *fsssh* More than you are able to deal with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0027
rows.name:
*fsssh* That's what has so many people interested in
our new initiative.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0028
rows.name:
If this job goes well, it will hopefully lead to even more
contracts down the line. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060101_MSG0029
rows.name:
Thank you for helping out. *fsssh* The voltant pick-ups
are from Jeffrey, Graham, and Pfeffen.[ST:wait ]
